events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but unfortunately, the screen has multiple scratches and there is a small crack on the casing. It seems defective straight out of the box.
The reported problem about scratches and a crack on the laptop screen and casing has been categorized under Product Defect.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this case regarding the reported defective product.

I have attached clear pictures showing the scratches on the screen and the crack on the side casing. Please check and advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option works better for you.
I would like to proceed with the replacement option. Please tell me what the shipping process will be and how long it will take.

My shipping address is 1234 Elm Street, Apartment 56B, Springfield, IL 62704.
Thanks for confirming your address. We have scheduled the replacement laptop shipment, it should arrive within 5 to 7 business days.
Your replacement request has been successfully processed and your case is now resolved on our side.
We are checking in to ensure you received your replacement laptop and everything is working as expected.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for your cooperation and patience.
